title: Serif font
content:
Hello,  
wondering what this font is called?  
Thanks in advance!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130817190810im_/http:/typophile.com/files/font001_5766.jpg)
author: Emma-L

comments.content:
I'm leaning toward [New Century Schoolbook Roman](http://web.archive.org/web/20130817190810/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/new-century-schoolbook/), although there might be another Century related typeface that is closer.  
Don
